summary:
The Security Council,
Recalling previous resolutions 955 (1994), 1165 (1998), 1329 (2000), 1411 (2002) and 1431 (2002),
Having considered nominations for permanent judges of the International Tribunal for Rwanda,
Forwards to the General Assembly the following nominations for permanent judges:
1. Mr. Mansoor Ahmad (Pakistan)
2. Mr. Teimuraz Bakradze (Georgia)
3. Mr. Kocou Arsène Capo-Chichi (Benin)
4. Mr. Frederick Mwela Chomba (Zambia)
5. Mr. Pavel Dolenc (Slovenia)
6. Mr. Serguei Aleckseievich Egorov (Russian Federation)
7. Mr. Robert Fremr (Czech Republic)
8. Mr. Asoka de Zoysa Gunawardana (Sri Lanka)
9. Mr. Mehmet Güney (Turkey)
10. Mr. Michel Mahouve (Cameroon)
11. Mr. Winston Churchill Matanzima Maqutu (Lesotho)
12. Mr. Erik Møse (Norway)
13. Ms. Arlette Ramaroson (Madagascar)
14. Mr. Jai Ram Reddy (Fiji)
15. Mr. William Hussoin Sekule (United Republic of Tanzania)
16. Mr. Emile Francis Short (Ghana)
17. Mr. Francis M. Ssekandi (Uganda)
18. Mr. Cheick Traoré (Mali)
19. Mr. Xenofon Ulianovschi (Republic of Moldova)
20. Ms. Andrésia Vaz (Senegal)
21. Ms. Inés Mónica Weinberg de Roca (Argentina)
22. Mr. Mohammed Ibrahim Werfalli (Libyan Arab Jamahiriya)
23. Mr. Lloyd George Williams (Saint Kitts and Nevis)
